scholars.name: Scholar test - Cass (Ottawa)
scholars.description: The Ottawa Chapter of the Academy of European Medieval Martial Arts welcomes its first two Scholars into its ranks. Cass successfully passed their scholar tests in front of 3 Scholars, 2 Free Scholars, and 1 Provost. Their tests covered the Art of Fiore dei Liberi and that of the Bolognese tradition, primarily from Dal'Agocchie's manuscript. They demonstrated their knowledge of theory, their execution of the principles and plays, and free fenced with arming swords to the satisfaction of all present.
